name: Skillful Finger Mover
description:
Skillful Finger To Get Over It is an endless game with lot of obstacles.
A perfect game with endless line and with many different levels.
Slide your finger on the line, keep away from the obstacles and sides.
Be Careful about the width of Line,Don't Fall from it!!!
Don't touch the borders and be aware of the moving obstacles.
Keep running as far as you can.
